school_name: St. Louis Community College at Wildwood
comments: Great lecturer, although she can move pretty quickly thru the material. Tests are very straight forward from ppt slides--but not easy. You must study. Grades very fair and quickly. Lab exams are much easier than lecture. I hear horror stories of other A&P professors. Dr. T is great! Highly recommend!

school_name: St. Louis Community College at Wildwood
comments: Pros: Knowledgeable professor. Helpful study guides and practice tests. Fastest grader ever. Cons: Abrasive personality, rolls her eyes at you, talks negatively about students who don\'t understand concepts. Seems like she really does not want to be teaching and would rather be running because she "is a runner"...which you will hear 1000 times.

school_name: St. Louis Community College at Wildwood
comments: Excellent professor. Her expectations are very clear. Do the assigned labs, study the ppt slides, study guides, and practice tests--you will do well. She is very knowledgeable and helpful if you need assistance. She makes the extensive amount of material manageable and easy to understand.

school_name: St. Louis Community College at Wildwood
comments: I took Dr. Thebeau\'s class for both A&P I & II. She was completely thorough in presenting the subject matter and I feel prepared to move on to nursing school. She was very helpful in preparing the for the exams - this is not to say that her exams were easy though -you definitely have to know the material.

school_name: St. Louis Community College at Wildwood
comments: Awesome teacher!! Very thorough, great practical explanations. Her test are very straight-forward. Has study guides and practice exams that are incredibly helpful for the tests. I would highly recommend her for ANY class she teaches

school_name: St. Louis Community College at Wildwood
comments: It\'s an easy A. Hard to believe for a class that is supposed to be really hard.

school_name: St. Louis Community College at Wildwood
comments: If you pay attention in class as do all of the homework this class is an easy "A". She makes a study guide for tests and the tests are very up front. I learned a lot from her!
